author: wddgit
body:
Mostly this is changing the return type of "produce" functions in ESProducers from shared_ptr to unique_ptr, because they do not need to return shared_ptr and this will help as we migrate towards running multiple IOVs concurrently. ESProducer "produce" functions that return shared_ptr and use the features a shared_ptr provides need special treatment to run properly with concurrent IOVs. By changing ESProducers to return unique_ptr where possible, we make it easier to find those ESProducers that need special treatment both now and in the future. As a side benefit, performance is also slightly better with a unique_ptr.

This  PR modifies L1ConfigOnlineProdBase and L1ConfigOnlineProdBaseExt and all the ESProducers that inherit from them.

(Note that previous PR #25037 was rejected and closed, then split into 3 different PRs. The first two of those PRs included all the changes in CondCore and have now already been merged. This is the 3rd of those PRs and includes only the changes from that PR outside CondCore. But other than that, it has not changed since then)

There is also a little bit of cleanup, like deleting unused "using" statements around the lines of code modified. And also some unrelated changes added by "scram b code-checks".
title: Prepare for concurrent IOVs, L1ConfigOnlineProdBase
